1.0.2.name: wordpress/bcs-support
1.0.2.description:
该插件支持使用百度云存储BCS作为附件存储空间。 This is a plugin that use Baidu Cloud Storage(BCS) for attachments remote saving.

在百度BAE上支持xmlrpc。 Support xmlrpc on Baidu App Engine(BAE).

详见http://blog.gimhoy.com/archives/bcs-support.html. For more details, please visit http://blog.gimhoy.com/archives/bcs-support.html.

Github开源项目：https://github.com/Gimhoy/BCS-Support/
